content: the damask socks are a beautifully textured pair of socks featuring a knit-and-purl design that mimics tiny cables without the extra effort inspired by the popular damask hat free pattern here 1 these socks are perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your sock drawer or gifting to someone special this pattern is beginner-friendly yet sophisticated with instructions that guide you through creating a stunning texture from simple stitches details construction top-down sock pattern needles 2 25mm us 1 dpns affiliate link 2 or preferred sock knitting method yarn knitpicks stroll affiliate link 3 features textured knit/purl stitch pattern reinforced heel pair the damask socks with the matching damask hat for a coordinated look that s as fun to knit as it is to wear grab your needles download the pattern and let s knit something beautiful together download now and start your next cozy project 4 1 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-damask-hat/ 2 https //shrsl com/4r3gb 3 https //shrsl com/3usf5 4 https //amandammorse com/free-sock-patterns-to-download-damask-socks/
